001package io.github.ai4ci.functions;
002
003import java.io.Serializable;
004
005import org.immutables.value.Value;
006
007import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.annotation.JsonDeserialize;
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.annotation.JsonSerialize;
009
010/**
011 * A simple function that always returns a fixed value.
012 *
013 * <p>
014 * This interface describes a simple function that always returns the same value
015 * regardless of the input. It is used as a baseline or default in cases where a
016 * more complex function is not required. For example, it may be used as a
017 * default contact odds function in demographic configurations or as a simple
018 * parameter function in execution configurations.
019 *
020 * <p>
021 * Downstream uses include demographic and execution configuration code such as
022 * {@link io.github.ai4ci.config.setup.AgeStratifiedDemography} and
023 * {@link io.github.ai4ci.config.execution.ExecutionConfiguration}.
024 *
025 * @author Rob Challen
026 */
027@Value.Immutable
028@JsonSerialize(as = ImmutableFixedValueFunction.class)
029@JsonDeserialize(as = ImmutableFixedValueFunction.class)
030public interface FixedValueFunction extends Serializable, SimpleFunction {
031
032        /**
033         * Creates a fixed value function that always returns the specified value.
034         *
035         * <p>
036         * This factory method allows you to create a fixed value function with any
037         * specified value. It may be used as a simple parameter function in various
038         * configurations where a constant value is sufficient.
039         *
040         * @param value the fixed value to be returned by the function
041         * @return a fixed value function that always returns the specified value
042         */
043        public static FixedValueFunction of(double value) {
044                return ImmutableFixedValueFunction.builder().setValue(value).build();
045        }
046
047        /**
048         * Creates a fixed value function that always returns 1.
049         *
050         * <p>
051         * This is a convenient factory method for creating a simple fixed value
052         * function with a default value of 1. It may be used as a default contact
053         * odds function or as a simple parameter function in various configurations.
054         *
055         * @return a fixed value function that always returns 1
056         */
057        public static FixedValueFunction ofOne() {
058                return ImmutableFixedValueFunction.builder().setValue(1).build();
059        }
060
061        /**
062         * The fixed value returned by this function.
063         *
064         * <p>
065         * This value is returned by the {@link #value(double)} method regardless of
066         * the input. It is set at construction and may be used as a simple parameter
067         * or default function in various configurations.
068         *
069         * @return the fixed value returned by this function
070         *
071         */
072        double getValue();
073
074        /**
075         * Returns the fixed value of this function.
076         *
077         * <p>
078         * This method ignores the input and always returns the value specified by
079         * {@link #getValue()}. It provides a simple implementation of the
080         * {@link SimpleFunction} interface.
081         */
082        @Override
083        default double value(double x) {
084                return this.getValue();
085        }
086}
